00026 bool create_folder(const string path)
00027 {
00028         /* Create folder. */
00029         string command_mkdir_folder("mkdir -p ");
00030         command_mkdir_folder.append(path);
00031         if (system (command_mkdir_folder.c_str()) != 0)
00032         {
00033                 return false;
00034         }
00035         return true;
00036 }

00042 {

00044         string command_rm_folder("rm -f -r ");

00047         {
00048                 return false;
00049         }
00050         /* Create folder. */

00075 void generate_names_instance(const Graph &graph, string datas[], size_t size_d)
00076 {
00077         property_map<Graph, vertex_data_t>::const_type props(get(vertex_data_t(), graph));
00078 
00079         for(size_t i(0); i < size_d; i++)
00080         {
00081                 datas[i] = props[i]->to_string();
00082         }

00088 void generate_names_attr(const Graph &graph, string datas[], size_t size_d)
00089 {
00090         property_map<Graph, vertex_data_t>::const_type props(get(vertex_data_t(), graph));
00091 
00092         for(size_t i(0); i < size_d; i++)
00093         {
00094                 /* The vertexs in a Down graph are ONLY Expr_instance. */
00095                 datas[i] = ((Expr_instance*)props[i])->get_attr()->get_name();
00096         }
00097 }

00102 void print_graph(const Graph &graph, const string path, const string name_file, const string name_graph, const string names[], string shape_vertex)
00103 {
00104         static unsigned short num_file(0); /* For name of file png. */
00105 
00106         /* Create file dot. */
00107         string n_f(path);
00108         stringstream ins;
00109         ins << ++num_file;
00110         n_f.append(ins.str());
00111 
00112         n_f.append(name_file);
00113 
00114         n_f.append(".dot");
00115 
00116         /* Obtain of file of graphviz. */
00117         ofstream salida(n_f.c_str());
00118 
00119         map<string,string> graph_attr, vertex_attr, edge_attr;
00120 
00121         /* Sets the main characteristic of the graph. */
00122         graph_attr["label"]                     = name_graph;
00123         graph_attr["rankdir"]           = "TD";
00124         graph_attr["ratio"]                     = "compress";
00125         vertex_attr["shape"]            = shape_vertex;
00126         vertex_attr["color"]            = "black";
00127         vertex_attr["style"]            = "rounded,filled";
00128         vertex_attr["fillcolor"]        = "gray";
00129 
00130         /* Saves the dot file using the graphviz library. */
00131         write_graphviz(salida, graph, make_label_writer(names),default_writer(),make_graph_attributes_writer(graph_attr, vertex_attr,edge_attr));
00132 }

00138 Vertex return_vertex(const Graph &graph, const Expr_leaf *node)
00139 {
00140         property_map<Graph, vertex_data_t>::const_type props(get(vertex_data_t(), graph));
00141         for(size_t i(0); i < num_vertices(graph); i++)
00142         {
00143                 if (node->equals(props[i]))
00144                         return i;
00145         }
00146         return USHRT_MAX;
00147 }
00148 
00152 void merge_graph(const Graph &graph1, const Graph &graph2, Graph &graph_merged)
00153 {
00154         /* Cleans the result graph. */
00155         graph_merged.clear();
00156 
00157         /* Copies the graph1 to result graph. */
00158         graph_merged = graph1;
00159 
00160         /* Join the graph2 to result graph. */
00161         property_map<Graph, vertex_data_t>::const_type props(get(vertex_data_t(), graph2));
00162         property_map<Graph, vertex_data_t>::type props_merged(get(vertex_data_t(), graph_merged));
00163         /* Circle for vertices. */
00164         for(size_t i(0); i < num_vertices(graph2); i++)
00165         {
00166                 Vertex vertex(return_vertex(graph_merged,props[i]));
00167                 if (vertex == USHRT_MAX)
00168                 {
00169                         /* The vertex is new in the graph. */
00170                         vertex = add_vertex(graph_merged);
00171                         put(props_merged,vertex,props[i]);
00172                 }
00173         }
00174         /* Cicle for edges. */
00175         graph_traits<Graph>::edge_iterator ei, ei_end;
00176         for (tie(ei,ei_end) = edges(graph2); ei != ei_end; ++ei)
00177         {
00178                 Vertex source_vertex(source(*ei, graph2));
00179                 Vertex target_vertex(target(*ei, graph2));
00180 
00181                 Vertex desc_source(return_vertex(graph_merged,props[source_vertex]));
00182                 Vertex desc_target(return_vertex(graph_merged,props[target_vertex]));
00183 
00184                 add_edge(desc_source,desc_target,graph_merged);
00185         }
00186 }
00187 
00192 void project_graph(const Symbol *symb, Graph &graph)
00193 {
00194         /* Applies transitivity to graph with only nodes of symb. */
00195         warshall_transitive_closure(graph);
00196 
00197         property_map<Graph, vertex_data_t>::type props(get(vertex_data_t(), graph));
00198         /* Reduces the graph for symbol "symb". */
00199         for (size_t i(num_vertices(graph)); i > 0; i--)
00200         {
00201                 const Expr_instance *ins(dynamic_cast<const Expr_instance*>(props[i-1]));
00202                 if (!(ins) || !(ins->get_symb()->equals(*symb)) || !(ins->get_num() == 0))
00203                 /* The node is a literal-node or is a node with symbol diferent that symb. */
00204                 {
00205                         clear_vertex(i-1, graph);
00206                         remove_vertex(i-1, graph);
00207                 }
00208         }
00209 }

00211 bool belong_index(const unsigned short &index, const vector<unsigned short> &vec)
00212 {
00213         for(size_t i(0); i < vec.size(); i++)
00214         {
00215                 if(index == vec[i])
00216                 {
00217                         return true;
00218                 }
00219         }
00220         return false;
00221 }

00226 string cleaning_tabs(const string str)
00227 {
00228         string aux("");
00229         for(int i=0; str[i] != '\0'; i++)
00230         {
00231                 aux.push_back((str[i] == '\t')? ' ': str[i]);
00232         }
00233         return aux;
00234 }

00236 string write_inf_context(const vector<unsigned short> &context_vec)
00237 {
00238         string context;
00239         if (context_vec.size() == 1)
00240         {
00241                 context.append(" hasn't an inferior context");
00242         }
00243         else
00244         {
00245                 context.append(" with inferior context: ");
00246                 for(size_t i(1); i < context_vec.size(); i++)
00247                 {
00248                         context.append(" R");
00249                         stringstream key_rule;
00250                         key_rule << context_vec[i];
00251                         context.append(key_rule.str());
00252                         if(i < context_vec.size() - 1)
00253                         {
00254                                 context.append(" ,");
00255                         }
00256                 }
00257         }
00258         return context;
00259 }
